org.agent.slang.out.videoconferencing

Class VCDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ib.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • org.ib.component.base.SourceComponent
        • org.agent.slang.out.videoconferencing.VCDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ib.component.base.ActiveListener, org.ib.component.base.Closeable, org.ib.component.base.Publisher, org.ib.component.base.ReactiveListener, org.ib.component.base.Source

    public class VCDisplay
extends org.ib.component.base.SourceComponent
    This component can display what VCStreamer streams.

    It requires exactly one parameter: basePort, which should be set to the port given in the target parameter of VCStreamer.

    As mentioned in the documentation for that component, make sure to allocate a few more ports. OS Compatibility: Windows and Linux
